name: Digit Daze
description: Digit Daze is a fun and challenging mathematical puzzle game. You are given a main number less than 100 and one to four color goals to complete with the 16 provided digits. Each color goal can require 2 to 4 numbers to reach the main number.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
